entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [mono][hotreload] Add instance field #93036
    8.0.0
  • HttpListenerRequest.UserAgent should be attributed as nullable #93033
  • Make runtime more friendly to Kubernetes and container systems in general #93030
    9.0.0
  • Reduce the number of thread requests further in the thread pool and from async IO completion dispatchers #93028
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT tests failing when to compile `aot-instances.dll.bc` when using `-O0` #93023
  • JIT: Flow Graph Modernization and Improved Block Layout #93020
    9.0.0
  • `.NET 9.0` Native Trace Instrumentation Support for HttpClient as per OTel specification #93019
  • [release/8.0] Wrong architecture libc++ bundled with wasm cross-compilers on linux-arm64 #93015
    8.0.0
  • ReflectionTypeLoadException when interface is loaded from different locations #93013
  • release/8.0 branch doesn't build with .NET 8 RC1 #93011
    8.0.0
  • [mono][net7] Cherrypick fixes to build runtime with Xcode 15 #93009
    7.0.x
  • ILLink fails to resolve method's base interface method if the interface method doesn't have newslot #93008
  • DllImport on Linux ignoring an already loaded module #92995
  • jitstress failing widely with NRE #92990
    9.0.0

Closed

  • System.Private.Corelib R2R PDB is not included in runtime pack #92456
    8.0.0
  • JIT Arm64: Incorrectly optimizes out narrowing #92865
    8.0.0
  • `System.Reflection` - `Type.GetCustomAttributes` Unexpected Attribute Count behavior #88473
    Future
  • Remove the `_obj` suffix on our CMake targets and remove the "interface" targets now that `target_link_libraries` can link to object libraries. #92787
    9.0.0
  • IndentedTextWriter doesn't use indentation on the first line. #92039
    Future
  • Failing on OSX - System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.TestCheckChildProcessUserAndGroupIds #93024
  • Follow up to CBOR date handling fix #92595
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ServerClosesOutboundControlStream_ClientClosesConnection - Status code: Unknown (0xdde6f334) #75270
    9.0.0
  • Selected apphost is not a valid PE file on s390x #92344
    8.0.0
  • Missing Microsoft.Extensions.* package README files #92963
  • MulticastInterface_Set_IPv6_Loopback_Succeeds doesn't #92622
  • Request for Manual Object Release Method in C# #93007
  • [mono] Fuse Vector128.WithElement and Vector128.GetElement on arm64 #85166
    Future
  • [QUIC] Split out MsQuic configuration from connection #42642
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'hwintrinsicChild->isContained()' #90508
    8.0.0
  • What really defines the result of typeof(MyType).GetHashCode()? #92973
  • .Net 8 RC1 Regression: error BLAZORSDK1001: Unable to find '{dll list}' to be lazy loaded later. Confirm that project or package references are included and the reference is used in the project. #92965
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono][hotreload] Generate seq_points if we don't have pdb information from HotReload #93039
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Split the MarshalAsParser into two classes #93038
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Added 'standalone' option when building tests for ilasm roundtrip #93037
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][hotreload] Adding test case failing #93035
    needs-area-label
  • Remove the MarshallingGeneratorFactoryKey type and construct the generator factory during the "source emit" stage #93034
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Make BasicBlock::bbPrev and bbNext private #93032
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][workloads] Allow overriding the current version #93031
    area-Build-mono
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Sigmoid and TensorPrimitives.SoftMax #93029
    area-System.Numerics
  • Try to resolve x64 libc++ being included with linux-arm64 #93027
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] WBT: Avoid using `-O0` in tests #93026
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Change SendAsync_SlowServerRespondsAfterDefaultReceiveTimeout_ThrowsHttpRequestException server to Loopback #93025
    area-System.Net.Http
  • System.Formats.Cbor package's readme #93021
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Expose TLS details for QUIC connection #93014
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix conflicting test assembly name in classloader tests #93012
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [browser] drop `create_task_callback` #93010
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Race in init_method when using LLVM AOT. #93006
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.x
  • JIT: Fix invalid smnegl transformation #93003
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Internal memcpy uses SIMD #93002
    arch-arm64, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser] streaming compile wasm bit earlier #93000
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add ordering side effects in fgMorphExpandInstanceField #92998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Try rooting less stuff for reflectable method signatures #92994
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Export debug helpers #92993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [6.0] Make thread pool thread timeouts configurable #92988
    area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Make thread pool thread timeouts configurable #92987
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.x
  • [8.0] Make thread pool thread timeouts configurable #92986
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Make thread pool thread timeouts configurable #92985
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Don't widen to Int128 in CastCache #92984
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove ActiveIssue on HostFactoryResolver tests #92983
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Interpreter automatic PGO #92981
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #92980
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #92979
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.24

Merged

  • Merge CoreCLR-based official builds legs into one leg per platform #92901
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Replace CMake Object Interfaces with CMake 3.20 Objects #92966
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • IndentedTextWriter doesn't use indentation on the first line #92791
    area-System.CodeDom, community-contribution
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Exp #93018
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/8.0] CI: runtime-wasm-perf: disable for PRs #92977
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix the path for crossgen2 for the outerloop cg2 legs #92971
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Consolidate some TensorPrimitivesTests logic around special values #92982
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • [release/8.0] Use invariant culture in CBOR date encoding #92924
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Cbor, 8.0.0
  • Cleanup iOS scenarios post HybridGlobalization scenario addition #92904
    area-Infrastructure
  • SPMI: Fix superpmi.py result assert #92997
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Fuse SIMD extract and insert on arm64 #92714
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix duplicate file name generated by GenerateHWIntrinsicTests_General.cs #92954
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #90556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix zero/sign extend casts on arm64 #92875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix typo in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.TraceSource PACKAGE.md #92989
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Fix issue with reflection invoke and pointer types #92922
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Throw when applying `JsonObjectHandling.Populate` to types with parameterized constructors. #92947
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Update branding to 7.0.13 #92970
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Make BasicBlock::bbJumpKind private #92908
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] CI: runtime-wasm-perf: disable for PRs #92978
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update branding to 6.0.24 #92969
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.24

Updated

  • Merge tests under tracing / Reflection / ReadyToRun / Regressions #92029
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use `add_linker_options` and `target_linker_options` in cmake #92844
    area-Infrastructure
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] WBT inner loop improvements #92968
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Create IL-RT folder to store roundtripped IL assemblies and sources, removed suffix '.asm' to roundtripped files, re-enabled rejit ilasm roundtripping #90110
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Entitle macOS executables while building #92967
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Allow experimenting with different CSE subsets #92918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Light up String.Manipulation APIs with Vector512 codepath #92579
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Support specifying multiple directories through SSL_CERT_DIR. #92920
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Implement LoadVector64x* and LoadVector128x* APIs #92855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove base type rooting for types in rooted assemblies #92864
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • HashSet.UnionWith preformance improvement #92300
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Define `getWasmIndirectFunctionTable` before initializing the #92683
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • `readonly`-ify fields based on whole program view #92923
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Manually update release/8.0 arcade to latest #92778
    Servicing-approved, blocking-release, area-codeflow
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement japanese calendar data #92471
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, help wanted, 9.0.0
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Permissive handling for runtimeconfig.json #92037
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • feat(83547): Adding escaping of property name for GetPath. #84688
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Apple mobile template allows passing process arguments to the runtime #92772
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Implement overrides for Span and ReadOnlySpan on SslStream #92889
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [mono][interp] Fix calling of static delegates with simd arguments #92927
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Merged stores: Fix alignment-related issues and enable SIMD where possible #92939
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • CBOR Writer: Use canonical NaN representation for NaN values #92934
    area-System.Formats.Cbor, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Migrate from catch_all to catch in the jiterpreter and destroy exceptions #91364
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Fix linux-x64 AOT-llvm perf job #92644
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove dependencies on non-live illink #91468
    needs-area-label

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 8.0 rc1 SDK ContainerFamily=alpine goes looking for non-existing Alpine tag #35848
  • Containers: detection of port config should prefer ASPNETCORE_URLS #35845
  • Provide feed details when erroring on unauthorized feed #35842

PullRequests

Created

  • Workload manifest updater cleanup #35859
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add workload garbage collection tests for side-by-side manifests #35857
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2283650 #35854
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #35853
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Detect correctly multitargeted apps for trim/AOT/single-file warnings #35851
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #35850
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #35849
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #35839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Treat old TFMs as unsupported by ILLink analyzers #35837
    untriaged, Area-ILLink

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #35838
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • SDK resolver perf: Optimize EnvironmentProvider.SearchPaths #35807
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.403 #35833
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.310 #35832
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.113 #35831
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.416 #35830
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.319 #35829
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload history #34946
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Including RuntimePackAsset in DesignerRuntimeImplementationProjectOutputGroup #35835
    untriaged

  • SDK resolver perf: Don't check current process for dotnet.exe on .NET Framework #35805
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make CheckForDuplicateItems case insensitive #35697
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Roslyn reports false errors for interceptors for conditional invocations #70243
  • Collection expressions: handle use site diagnostics and other complex cases when using well-known members #70241
    17.9
  • The call is ambiguous when using collections literals with interpolated strings #70238
    17.9
  • Intellisence ignores protected accessibility for constructor in derived classes #70235
    Backlog
  • macOS tests are crashing regularly #70233
  • `AbstractChangeImplementationCodeRefactoringProvider` crashes with `InvalidOperationException` calling LINQ's `First` #70232

Closed

  • "The call is ambiguous" error when using collection expressions on an overloaded method #70236
  • Test plan for "Primary Constructors" feature #65697
    17.8
  • Const pattern mathing with null weird behaviour #70234

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid infinite cycle caused by an early binding of DefaultParameterValue attribute. #70242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Load solutions out-of-proc #70240
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix checksum hierarchy #70239
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix GetDocumentationComment returns unresolved doc reference for inheritdoc typeparamref #70230
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • SG work (warmup compilation) #70227
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Use stronger typing wrt to checksums and checksum trees #70237
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2283054 #70228
  • Add O# EA accessor for DocumentId.CreateFromSerialized #70229
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Create and cache a singleton directive parser inside the lexer #70223
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70231
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Improve checksum perf #70220
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2281126 #70204

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70244
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Collection expressions: optimize List<T> construction #70197
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Collection expressions: ImmutableArray optimization #70222
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: analyze nullability of element assignments #70192
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix VB features impacted by IOperation change #70191
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • fix missing space for numeric token #70135 #70202
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Send batch events for DiagnosticsUpdatedArgs #70039
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid cycle caused by calculation of ObsoleteState/ExperimentalState. #70171
    Area-Compilers, Tenet-Reliability, untriaged, 17.8
  • Collection expressions: update rules for conversion to IEnumerable collection #69956
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Collection expressions: update better conversion from expression rule #70158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Restore "Do source-generation only in our OOP process" #70109
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable LSP pull diagnostics from Run Code Analysis command #70186
    Area-IDE, Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: avoid intermediate List<T> if spread elements have known length #69875
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • PR for testing purposes #70174
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Include implicit MyBase.New() call in IBlockOperation for VB Constructors #69873
    Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, untriaged
  • Optimize `T? ?? <constant>` to `T.GetValueOrDefault(<constant>)` where `T?` is a nullable value type #70199
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Synthesized members #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid calling GetMembersUnordered for substituted types #70003
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Open up the internal EndpointHtmlRenderer for integrating frameworks #51148
  • Confirmation email sent after registering user via Identity API has link with relative path, should be only code #51146
  • Integration Testing returns 404 for all HTTP requests that work with curl/Postman #51143
  • ComponentBase.BuildRenderTree cannot be overriden but I need to override, unless there's alternate #51140
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_Login_Usability: Placeholder text for email and password field is not visible in normal mode. #51135
  • SectionContent doesn't work correctly with render modes #51132
    8.0.0
  • .Net8 Identity with ef core #51129
  • [Blazor] It's not possible to use JavaScript for state management when using Static Render Mode. #51128
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_login_Non-Text Contrast :Color contrast ratio of "Remember me" checkbox is (1.819:1) which is less than required 3:1 #51127
    8.0.0
  • [Blazor] In static render mode, scripts are not loaded onto the page after navigation. #51126
  • WebHost doesn't detect ASPNETCORE_HTTP_PORTS #51125
  • Allow IUserValidator.ValidateAsync return IdentityResult.Failed() without IdentityError #51123
  • Canceled request to .NET 8 RC 1 running on Azure AppService IIS InProcess hosting model causes ThreadPool Starvation #51121

Closed

  • Backport the fix from #43844 to .NET 6 LTS #43925
    6.0.12
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #51090
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #51124
  • [Blazor Server] Missing Event Callback Parameters Does Not Throw Errors. #51097
  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #49909
    8.0.0
  • Enhanced form submit to a different internal URL doesn't update browser location #50945
    8.0.0
  • Allow middleware routing manipulation in blazor #45653
    Backlog
  • Add Testing to BlazorWasmDebugging VSCode Extension #46483
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Document addition of Empty Blazor projects #46487
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Cannot select .net 8 preview 6 in Blazor Server even though installed. #49446
    .NET 9 Planning
  • SignalR Client client-to-server streaming is memory leaking in ConnectionState.UploadStreamToken #50913
  • Add [RenderModeStatic] attribute #51102
  • Support DateOnly with InputDate #51045
    8.0.0
  • IIS hosting. AspNetCoreModuleV2. NullReferenceException when SignalR socket disconnected #51105
  • Pass the circuit from the server to the client in Blazor Web for RenderModeServer #51053
  • Blazor Custom Elements Documentation Vanished #47273
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Quarantine BlazorWasmHostedTemplate_IndividualAuth_NoHttps_Works_WithOutLocalDB #47919
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Blazor] CascadingModelBinder rework. #48454
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Restore ability to compress all files during dotnet publish for Blazor wasm applications #46603
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Blazor] ComponentStatePersistenceManager needs to ensure the app has finished rendering #47025
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #51110
  • Perf regression: plaintext #51111

PullRequests

Created

  • MockTimeProvider -> FakeTimeProvider #51147
    area-networking
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #51145
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/6.0] Dispose CTS in HubConnection streaming #51139
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Dispose CTS in HubConnection streaming #51138
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Dispose CTS in HubConnection streaming #51137
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr
  • Added .vtt MIME type to text/vtt #51136
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update Identity Components in Blazor project template #51134
    area-mvc
  • OutputCache - use ref-counting on OutputCacheEntry to ensure that buffers are fully recycled #51131
    area-perf, feature-output-caching, area-networking, area-middleware
  • [Blazor] Emit action attribute when not explicit. #51130
    area-blazor
  • Change HealthCheckPublisherHostedService exception log from debug to error #51120
    area-healthchecks, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Fix `DragDrop_CanTrigger()` flakiness #51142
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 6.0.24
  • Update branding to 6.0.24 #51115
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.24
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `8a6feab` to `e47544a` #51049
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.24
  • [release/7.0] Fix `DragDrop_CanTrigger()` flakiness #51141
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, tell-mode, 7.0.13
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `8a6feab` to `e47544a` #51051
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.13
  • Update branding to 7.0.13 #51116
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.13
  • Update milestones for November servicing #51144
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Push history entry after enhanced submit with method=get #51013
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Dispose CTS in HubConnection streaming #51117
    area-signalr, feature-client-net, 9.0-preview1

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • background-image: url(@var) - The initial value of var cannot be empty. #17838
  • [Windows] CollectionView RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand not working #17836
  • [Windows] CollectionView with RemainingItemsThreshold does not scroll #17835
  • Regression: AppThemeBinding and VisualStates results in "An item with the same key has already been added" #17832
    .NET 8 GA
  • IndicatorView not visible on iOS #17831
  • [Windows] New CarouselView item doesn't render unless Window is resized #17830
  • [Windows] Resizing window causes CarouselView glitches #17829
  • Maui - some nugets do not work as path is too long "Could not find a part of the path" #17828
  • Packaged application without msix #17827
  • EmbeddedReferenceJar has no equivalent in MAUI #17826
  • Android app crashes when dragging into CollectionView #17823
  • `Border` breaks Xaml Live Preview #17822
  • Issue when Publish a Mac Catalyst app for distribution outside the Mac App Store #17820
  • Hiding keyboard prevents button command from firing #17819
  • Another Text Color issue #17818
    .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] CarouselView content renders behind tab bar #17817
  • .Net Maui using VS 2022 Community Edition #17816
  • TranslateTo Animation is not working on tablet #17815

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] [MAUI] The App crashes after pulling up and then pulling down the RefreshView C6 page #17391
    .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Crash in production: .NET ThreadPool Worker EXC_BAD_ACCESS KERN_INVALID_ADDRESS #17626
  • Calling SetBinding after setting a constant value crashes #17776
    .NET 8 GA
  • IsTextPredictionEnabled does not work on Windows and always presents suggestions #17834
  • [Android] Removing a CarouselView item crashes app #17809
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Disapearing controls in CollectionView on scrolling (on Android) #17508
  • [regression/7.0.0] [Android] Entry return type not rendering properly #17463
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Project is not compatible with net8.0 (.NETCoreApp,Version=v8.0) #17791
  • SwipeView inaccessible for screenreader users on Android #6648
    Under Consideration

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2] Update aspnet packages #17837
  • Make Entitlements in Templates for MacCatalyst more consistent between debug and release configs. #17833
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI
  • Fixed CollectionView reordering last item #17825
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix Button Ripple Effect not working #17821
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button

Merged

  • [Android] Fix ReturnType on Entry #17546
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [net8.0] Build the previous TFM for Essentials & Graphics #17042
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Enforce CA1805 across Core #17786
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.4 to 4.3.0 #17794
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2] Bump iOS version #17807
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17814
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Make Android respect power saving/disabled animations #17287
    .NET 8 SR1
  • API Doc improvements to fix online browser warnings #17732
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Correct InputView.MaxLengthProperty declaring type #17788
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • [testing] Run tests on device #17808
    area/testing
  • Bump the androidx group with 15 updates #17793
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 2 updates #17773
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, s/pr-needs-author-input, area/gestures, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Draw Line using BackgroundColor #17376
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Fix wrong Layout from hidden CollectionView #17659
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Implement gestures on Spans #17731
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image, stale, Under Consideration
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    community ✨, Under Consideration

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InMemoryDatabase does not support unstructured columns #31969
  • [QUESTION] Switch entity type for a record in TPH keeping same keys #31966
  • Projection filtering on second-level reference could not be translated #31961
  • Remote calls can delay DBContext being disposed? #31957

Closed

  • Update from ef 6 to ef 7. Error getting base type entities where one child has a required navigation property #31107
    7.0.x
  • AddCheckConstraint in model produces different output on linux vs. windows #31895
  • Search a table using a list of strings in EF Core 8 preview (where in clause) #31898
  • Multiple Navigations to same key when building Migration #31945
  • Error when trying to parameterize Property from ExecuteUpdateAsync: "Unable to cast object of type 'System.Linq.Expressions.TypedParameterExpression' to type 'System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression'." #31946
  • AsSplitQuery : Remove LEFT JOIN in child query when split the query and join self #31700

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Allow creating properties implicitly even when type is configured as non-property #31968
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0] Preserve `convertsNulls` in the compiled model #31967
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #31965
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #31964
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Treat required owned entities on derived types as optional. #31950
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/7.0] Treat required owned entities on derived types as optional. #31949
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/6.0] Validate single discriminator values #31937
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/6.0] Cosmos: Persist non-shadow int keys on owned entity types #31936
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/6.0] Switch to interpreted client-evaluation in parameter extractor #31784
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.24
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #29638 - GroupBy generates invalid SQL when using custom database function #31743
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.13
  • [release/6.0] Stop storing model references in the ValueGeneratorCache #31867
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.24
  • [release/6.0] Stop storing model references in the EntityMaterializerSource #31943
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30996 - Incorrect translation of comparison of current value with owned type default value #31742
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.13
  • Update branding to 7.0.13 #31954
  • Update branding to 6.0.24 #31953
  • [TEST ONLY] More AssertQuery refactoring #31956

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix to #30391 - JSON column issue with SetTableName() #31951
    Servicing-consider
